name: Boost New Media
tagline: Makes web & mobile apps your customers love to use
description:
We are a team of technology professionals designing and building web and mobile apps from our office in central Wellington. We love thinking, collaborating and creating with clients who, like us, want to make New Zealand a better place.
Boost is two designers, six developers, two Agile coaches and a writer, supported by a general manager, account manager, office administrator and sales ambassador. The team is led by Nathan Donaldson, CEO and founder of Boost.
